mangaName: Butsuri-san de Musou Shitetara Motemote ni Narimashita
alternativeNames: 物理さんで無双してたらモテモテになりました
author: Kt60
description: His harem consists of demi-human girls?! I was forced to withdraw from my world to learn magic with an alchemist, and while learning, I come upon a moment that only with my eyes could make any girl fall in love.
